name: Productivity & Focus
description: Practical guidance for boosting productivity and focus with simple habits

copy.en: A daily task list boosts productivity and clarity. Write three key tasks every morning and start with the one that has the biggest impact. Check them off as you go to build momentum. Share your list with a friend for accountability and motivation.

Use the Pomodoro technique to sharpen focus. Work for twenty-five minutes, then rest for five. After four rounds, take a longer break. Set a timer to stay consistent and study with a friend to strengthen focus through shared rhythm and accountability.
